name: fd-slicer
description: safely create multiple ReadStream or WriteStream objects from the same file descriptor
author: Andrew Kelley <superjoe30@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --timeout 10000 --reporter spec --check-leaks test/test.js
